pullRequest.title: Add Long Bone to Construction Calculator
pullRequest.bodyText:
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.
I cannot calculate how many Long Bones I need for my next Construction level with the RuneLite calculator
Describe the solution you'd like
I'd like to be able to know how many Long Bones I need for my next construction level.
Describe alternatives you've considered
I looked up how much xp long bones give, the amount of xp I need to level, and I know how to do basic division.
Long Bone Details
Level: 1 (There is no construction requirement for Death to the Dorgeshuun or any of its prerequisite quests)
Category: Miscellaneous
Planks: N/A
Count: 1
XP: 4500
I completely accept if this isn't the kind of thing that y'all want on your skill calculator, but it is a method of training construction.

commit.message:
Add Long Bone to Construction Calculator

*Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.*
I cannot calculate how many Long Bones I need for my next Construction level with the RuneLite calculator

*Describe the solution you'd like*
I'd like to be able to know how many Long Bones I need for my next construction level.

*Describe alternatives you've considered*
I looked up how much xp long bones give, the amount of xp I need to level, and I know how to do basic division.

*Long Bone Details*
_Level:_ *1* _There is no construction requirement for Death to the Dorgeshuun or any of its prerequisite quests
_Category:_ *Miscellaneous*
_Planks:_ *N/A*
_Count:_ *1*
_XP:_ *4500*

Add Long Bone to Construction Calculator

Definitely gotta add this to the calculator if we're adding the Long Bone too

nodes.bodyText: According to the wiki you need at least level 30 construction to be granted any xp.

commit.message: Move Long Bone from Level 1 to Level 30 requirement in Construction Calculator
